thread.title: More than you can expect from a four star hotel in London
thread.title_full: More than you can expect from a four star hotel in London - Review of The Park City Grand Plaza Kensington Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Kaizer66
title: More than you can expect from a four star hotel in London
text: Park City Grand Plaza Kensington is a hotel I can definitely recommend. Very clean and fresh room, good beds, no disturbing noices. Traveled with my wife and our teenager, our room was very spacious. Helpful staff, decent continental breakfast. Wifi was extraordinary good. Less than 10 minutes walk to nearest tube station (Earl´s Court). If you don´t expext premium luxus or unique charming character, Park City is an adorable choice.
